long_description: Tough and trail-ready, the KAVU Strapvisor Visor features lightweight, breathable cotton fabric and a moisture-wicking inner headband to keep you cool and comfortable when you're on the go. Minimalist design ensures maximum airflow while shading your eyes from the sun. Black underbill reduces glare; adjustable rear closure. Strap patterns vary and the visor may come with a different pattern than pictured.
short_description: Tough and trail-ready, the KAVU Strapvisor Visor features lightweight, breathable cotton fabric and a moisture-wicking inner headband to keep you cool and comfortable when you're on the go.
